name: Geof,f
description:
Geof,f (Good Exercise of Frog, Frog) is a fellow who sits on your desktop and tirelessly pedals his stationary bike. 

Control Geof,f using a keyboard or gamepad. On keyboard, use your feet to press the left and right sides of your keyboard. On gamepad, use your feet to press down on the left and right joysticks. 


Art/Game Design by Ava Best Lapeña
Programming/Game Design by Malcolm MacDonald
